```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- tibble(Ad = rep("A", times = 5000) ,
       Click = rep(c(0, 1), times = c(4500, 500))) %>%
  bind_rows(tibble(
    Ad = rep("B", times = 5000) ,
    Click = rep(c(0, 1), times = c(4430, 570))
  )) 


data %>% 
  table() %>% 
  fisher.test()


data %>% 
  table() %>% 
  chisq.test()

```
